course_description: First published in 1991 by {{% resource_link "bf73c453-9a4e-45fa-b3bc-673000197194" "Wellesley-Cambridge Press" %}}, this updated 3rd edition of the book is a useful resource for educators and self-learners alike. It is well organized, covers single variable and multivariable calculus in depth, and is rich with applications. There is also an online {{% resource_link "431a3397-6884-4494-91e6-9be4bbda31b3" "Instructor's Manual" %}} and a student {{% resource_link "941579e3-5f78-47fa-bc27-73cacae1ee53" "Study Guide" %}}.
